title: Organizational Change Leadership Design in Crisis Situations: Reflective Practice and Knowledge Exchange

context.prior_knowledge: Over 10 Years of Organizational Management and Leadership Experience, with Basic Understanding of Global Economic Environments
context.additional_context: Strengthening crisis-response leadership competencies through mathematics-based decision-making modeling

learning_goals: Learners can predict patterns of change by analyzing global crisis cases through mathematical modeling
Learners can design three or more organizational conflict resolution strategies using a reflective practice framework
Learners can specify decision-making processes during crises through knowledge exchange with peer leaders
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
